passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > main:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > form > header:nth-child(4) > h1:nth-child(1)
